item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: July 27, 2023 Today's Verse Romans 6:3â€“4 [3] Do you not know that all of us who have been baptized into Christ Jesus were baptized into his death? [4] We were buried therefore with him by baptism into death, in order that, just as Christ was raised from the dead by the glory of the Father, we too might walk in newness of life. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
